A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a fair movie but plenty of WTF moments.  There were entire scenes with dialog taken from Empire and Jedi. For a movie hailed for it's ground breaking uniqueness\,  I don't see it.  Rogue One is a far better movie in all respects. I would recommend seeing the movie just know that it isn't as awesome as the critics would have you believe.
